job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Job Description: </strong></p><ul><li>A computer science (or equivalent) background with good C# coding skills around development/test-automation (2+ years) is a must</li><li>Strong PowerShell or other scripting skills</li><li>Good knowledge on Linux. </li><li>Understanding of hardware and multi-processing systems</li><li>Cloud systems exposure &amp; experience is valuable. </li><li>SQL Server, or other database exposure and/or experience</li><li>Platform management</li><li>Application development</li><li>Testing</li><li>Performance engineering skill sets will be a bonus.</li></ul><p></p>
